en-US.product.details.empty.state.title: No product was selected
en-US.product.details.empty.state.subtitle: To see detailed information for a product, please select one
en-US.product.details.tooltip.аccountOpeningDa: The date of activation of the account in the bank's system
en-US.product.details.tooltip.lastUpdatedDate: Last date of parametar update for the product
en-US.product.details.tooltip.interestRate: The annualized cost of credit or debt-capital computed as the percentage ratio of interest to the principal
en-US.product.details.tooltip.accruedInterest: The interest that is earned (credit interest) or due (debit interest) but not settled yet
en-US.product.details.tooltip.overdraftExpiryD: Expiration date of the overdraft limit
en-US.product.details.tooltip.IBAN: Specifying the IBAN of the account
en-US.product.details.tooltip.principalAmount: The amount that was (originally) contracted for the respective product
en-US.product.details.tooltip.interestPaymentF: Number of times per year when the accumulated interest is settled to the product on a regular basis
en-US.product.details.tooltip.autoRenewalIndic: Indicates whether or not a product is to be continued after maturity automatically
en-US.product.details.tooltip.maturityBalance: Amount payable at the end of a holding period of a product
en-US.product.details.tooltip.term: The period of time and/or the interest rate arranged between Bank and customer
en-US.product.details.tooltip.maturityDate: End term of a holding period
en-US.product.details.tooltip.monthlyInstalmen: A fixed payment amount paid by a borrower to the bank at a specified date each calendar month
en-US.product.details.tooltip.minimumRequiredB: Minimum amount that a customer must have in an account in order to receive some sort of service, such as keeping the account open or receive interest
en-US.product.details.tooltip.creditLimit: Monetary amount of the used overdraft
en-US.product.details.tooltip.minimumPayment: The minimum payment set a percentage of balance, or a fixed cash amount
en-US.product.details.tooltip.minimumPaymentDu: Minimum Payment Due Date shown on your monthly statement to remain in good standing
en-US.product.details.tooltip.validThru: Expiration date of a credit card, after which is no longer valid
en-US.product.summary.error.legal.entity.not.a: Not allowed to list arrangements for this legal entity id
en-US.product.summary.error.paging.size: Must be greater than or equal to 1
en-US.product.summary.error.paging.from: Must be greater than or equal to 0
